item.description:
TEA & QI AT THE GREEN TEA HOUSE

Please join us for a special Tea & Qi event at the Green Tea House! Relax your mind, body and spirit with a calming ear acupuncture treatment followed by a soothing cup of herbal tea.

Saturday, October 16th
3pm to 6pm
The Green Tea House
40-42 Isham Road
West Hartford, CT 06053
(860) 232-6666

EZ Acupuncture & Herbs is hosting provide affordable ear acupuncture treatments at the Green Tea House directly in the store! Guests will receive an ear acupuncture treatment in the Green Tea House's serene tea ceremony room, followed by your choice of delicious herbal tea for enhanced healing effects.


Link to Flyer



Acupuncture and herbs go hand-in-hand in Oriental Medicine - they help circulate and balance Qi (vital energy) in the body to prevent illness and promote well-being. Consuming herbs after an acupuncture treatment enhances the therapeutic effects of this natural, holistic treatment. Ear acupuncture is proven to relieve stress, detoxify the body, and help reduce cravings for food, alcohol and nicotine. This is a quick, affordable treatment designed to thoroughly relax the mind and the body in thirty minutes or less. Most people experience a deep sense of relaxation immediately following the treatment and other additional benefits such as relief from insomnia.

Guests will be served on a first-come, first-served basis. $20 will be charged at the door, and includes an ear acupuncture treatment and your choice of herbal tea at the Green Tea House.
item.name: TEA & QI for Energy Healing
